ygData.subject: RE: Another question about the new armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: yes i completed it as well with the same result, i will be talking to our server GM this afternoon.  a few other bards around have reported the same thing.  on
ygData.messageBody:
yes i completed it as well with the same result, i will be talking to our
server GM this afternoon. a few other bards around have reported the same
thing. on the other hand, i still want to know how there is more than one
gypsy lute that comes from mistmoore =)

Shada
>
> From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>
> As an aside... On the "Concert Hall" message board, a fellow
> bard attempted
> to complete the quest for the Lambent Breastplate (the one
> the requires the
> lute and the carapace?). Anyway, he forked over his Lute,
> carapace and
> required stone, and got absolutely nothing in return. Either
> the quest is
> broken, or the Lute of the Gypsy Princess is NOT the correct
> lute to use.
>
> Desmei Sightblinder
> Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)
